[DAZ Studio specific Drag and Drop classes]

Detailed Description

Drag and Drop type that encodes a list of DzNode objects.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzNodeListDrag::DzNodeListDrag ( const DzNodeList &  nodeList  ) 

Creates a new drag object that encodes a list of node pointers. This drag object provides the MIME type: "DAZStudio/nodeptr-list"

Parameters:
nodeList The list of node pointers to encode in this drag object.
dragSource A pointer to the widget that generated the drag object.

Member Function Documentation

void DzNodeListDrag::decode ( const QMimeData *  src,
DzNodeList &  nodeList 
) [static]

Convenience function for decoding the MIME type: "DAZStudio/nodeptr-list" Populates nodeList with pointers to DzNode objects as decoded form src.

Parameters:
src A pointer to a MIME source that encodes a list of DzNode pointers.
nodeList This list will be populated with the pointers encoded in src.
QByteArray DzNodeListDrag::encode ( const DzNodeList &  nodeList  )  [static]

Convenience function to encode a list of node pointers into the MIME type: "DAZStudio/nodeptr-list".

Parameters:
nodeList The list of node pointers to encode.
Returns:
A QByteArray containing the list encoded as MIME data.
